mapper.select: select * from ( select * from ( select rownum as rnum, n.* from(select * from news order by news_no desc)n) where rnum between#{start} and #{end}) full join (select * from (select member_no, news_no from news_like group by (member_no, news_no)) join (select news_no, count(*) as "LIKE_COUNT" from news_like group by news_no) using(news_no)) using(news_no)
mapper.delete: delete from news_like where member_no = #{memberNo} and news_no = #{newsNo}
